titles.title: Military Dependents Education Act of 1993
A bill to shift Impact Aid funding responsibility for military connected children from the Department of Education to the Department of Defense.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1741)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.

bill.summary: 2/17/1993--Introduced. Military Dependents Education Act of 1993 - Amends Federal law for impact aid to local educational agencies to shift funding responsibility for militarily connected children (including those with disabilities) from the Department of Education to the Department of Defense.
